attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and hold election so that the British electorate can give it's verdict on MP's expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British electorate have no faith and do not support  MP's who have abused to their own advantage the system of expenses. In the circumstances Parliament should be dissolved so that new MP's can be elected so that the urgent issues that this country faces can be dealt with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
